## Source: ossf-package-analysis (193b700787067d6385d6c82c01f6a541b7532dc55e9a9abbaa0152ec22ce4a9e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@listr1/prompt-adapter-inquirer' @ 20.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
